name: riddle_0
description: How do you tell a boy snowman apart from a girl snowman?

name: riddle_2
description: What do you call a three humped camel?

name: riddle_3
description: What do you get when you mix a snowman and a wolf?

name: riddle_4
description: Say the following: roast, boast, coast, post. What do you put in a toaster?

name: riddle_5
description: What never gets any wetter no matter how hard it rains?

name: riddle_6
description: What three letters change a girl into a woman?

name: riddle_7
description: Which berry makes a harsh noise?

name: riddle_8
description: What do you get when you mix lemons with gun powder?

name: riddle_9
description: Which word in the dictionary is spelled incorrectly?

name: riddle_10
description: What’s in a man’s pants that you won’t find in a girl’s dress?

name: riddle_11
description: What is the saddest fruit in the world?
